info.name: iyzico Collection
info.description: ## üöÄ Quick and Secure Start to API Integration This Postman collection is designed for developers who want to integrate with the iyzico API. It provides sample requests for iyzico services to help you streamline your testing and integration process without any issues. ### ‚öôÔ∏è Environment Variables The collection is optimized for use with different environments (sandbox/live). You can get started by setting the following variables: ``` "apiKey" : Your iyzico API key. "secretKey" : Your iyzico secret key. "baseUrl" : The URL of the environment you want to send requests to (sandbox/live). ``` Check out our [Live vs. Sandbox](https://docs.iyzico.com/en/getting-started/preliminaries/live-vs-sandbox) guide to understand the differences between testing and production environments. ### üìß Support & Feedback If you encounter any issues or would like to contribute to the collection, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us: üì© [entegrasyon@iyzico.com](https://null) ### üìö Additional Resources - [API Documentation](https://docs.iyzico.com) - [GitHub Sample Projects](https://github.com/iyzico)

exec: // payload'u alalƒ±m ve uri path ile randomKey'i birle≈ütirelim.
var payload = _.isEmpty(request.data) ? randomKey + uri_path : randomKey + uri_path + request.data;
